name: Knock Back Jack
description:
Controls:

WASD : Move

Mouse : Aim + Fire


Instructions:

Find the portal in the level, and see how high a score you can get!

Share your score in the comments!

Description:

You play Jack, a cop with a big gun that knocks you back. Hence the name "Knock Back Jack".

You have to find the next portal in the room to get down a level, and fight of the enemies trying to stab you.
How high a score can you get?

Made for the LOWREZJAM

Made entirely by myself* in Godot

*Font from here (Public Domain)
